title: WTB or trade for AB 460 HOFer

posts.post_title: WTB or trade for AB 460 HOFer
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
I’m looking to buy or trade for a graded 3-4.5 American Beauty 460 HOFer. Interesting in anyone at this point. Message or email at the address below.

My trading stock is a little thin at this point as I’m just starting back, but figured I would start at the beginning with the American Beauty 460.

Here are the duplicate fronts I have that I can add in as trade help, if you like:

Bender Port SGC 2.5 GD+
Clarke Port SC 150/30 SGC 2.5 GD+
Tolstoi McGraw with Cap SGC 1.5
(Let’s see if iPad pics load)

Thanks,
Bob
